testCaseName: Verify Navigation in the About section
objective: Login and navigate to each tab in 'About' Module
preconditions: A valid user name and password combination

edgeCases.description: Navigate to About section immediately after login without waiting for dashboard load
Attempt navigation with session timeout (simulate by logging out and navigating)
Navigate to each tab rapidly in succession

expectedResult: User should be able to login and navigate through each tab in the About section as specified in the expected results.
